word:
I desire, while my life shall last, to do all in my power for the Master. I have a faithful band of workers. They are devoted to my work 


                                 -25- 

and my interests, and I appreciate their help. I do not know how long my life may be spared. I am grateful to my heavenly Father for the strength and the blessings He gives me. I am so thankful that I can have a part in His work.
